Radiohead Album Palette

Radiohead Album Palette

inRainbows_palette(option)

Arguments

option

Album name to use for colour scale. See Details.

Value

palette function

Details

Here are the color scales:

Examples

hist(1:8,col =inRainbows_palette("ok_computer")(4), main = "ok_computer")
hist(1:14,col =inRainbows_palette("httf")(7), main = "httf")
